mapper.select: select count(*) totalRows from face_track_record a left join zs_person_info as p on a.person_code=p.code inner join ht_xq_info xq on xq.code=a.xq_code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode

select a.device_location deviceLocation from face_track_record a left join zs_person_info as p on a.person_code=p.code inner join ht_xq_info xq on xq.code=a.xq_code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode

set @id=#{params.start}; select f.xqCode, f.xqName, f.captureId,f.personName,f.faceImgUrl,f.capImgUrl ,f.capVideoUrl,f.capVUrl,f.deviceName,f.deviceAddr,f.deviceLocation ,f.capTime,f.contrastValue,f.capDevCode,f.capDevChannel ,f.creTime,f.updTime,(@id:=@id+1) id FROM ( select a.xq_code xqCode,xq.name xqName, a.capture_id captureId,CASE WHEN p.code is null THEN '陌生人' ELSE p.name END as personName,a.face_img_url faceImgUrl ,a.cap_img_url capImgUrl,a.cap_video_url capVideoUrl,a.capVUrl,a.device_name deviceName,a.device_addr deviceAddr,a.device_location deviceLocation ,date_format(a.cap_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') capTime,a.contrastValue,a.cap_dev_code capDevCode,a.cap_dev_channel capDevChannel ,date_format(a.cre_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') creTime,date_format(a.upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updTime from face_track_record a left join zs_person_info as p on a.person_code=p.code inner join ht_xq_info xq on xq.code=a.xq_code inner join (select area_id from ht_area where parent_ids like concat('%',#{params.areaId},'%')) area on area.area_id=xq.sso_regionalcode
) f order by f.capTime desc limit #{params.start},#{params.limit}
